nodes.text: Night's Homecoming was a roleplaying-game adventure in year three of the Living Force campaign. It was the third adventure in the Night Eyes trilogy and was written by Margaret Heintz and edited by Ron Heintz.

While the Cularin system had disappeared from the galaxy, the Thaereian military kidnapped Night Forael Wren, the daughter of Senator Lavina Wren, so that they could blackmail her into supporting them in the Galactic Senate. Lavina wants her daughter back, and the heroes must travel to Thaere Privo to rescue her.
